co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
Interface WorkflowContext

public interface WorkflowContext

Represents the runtime context of a WorkflowAction.

getLogicalStartTime

long getLogicalStartTime()

getProgramRunner

Callable<RuntimeContext> getProgramRunner(String name)
Returns a Callable that launches the associated program with the specified name when the call method is invoked. When the program completes, the Callable returns the RuntimeContext of the program or null if no such context exists.

An Exception is thrown from the Callable.call() method if the program fails

Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if no program with the specified name is defined in the workflow

getRuntimeArguments

Map<String,String> getRuntimeArguments()
Returns:
A map of the argument's key and value.
